name: Gravity Well
description: On a derelict research space station, you'll find yourself solving puzzles to complete a high value contract, but in the end, will the job be worth it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Processor 5th Gen or later Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Modern graphics card with at least 2GB of dedicated memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
